problem.p: This problem assigns partial credit for Brazil. It uses a "points" style where a partially correct choice is worth 50% credit, or a different amount as specified by the point_value attribute.
Which of the following countries has the largest population?

choicegroup.label: Which of the following countries has the largest population?

div.p: The population of Indonesia is approximately 250 million.
The population of Brazil is approximately 200 million - half credit.
The population of Russia is approximately 146 million.
The population of Germany is approximately 81 million.
